title: 一名醫學美容中心女董事涉嫌詐騙　下周一到法院應訊
news_content:
一名醫學美容中心女董事涉嫌詐騙一名股東投資580萬元，誇大購買醫學美容儀器及裝修中心的費用，並涉嫌挪用公款逾310萬元，被控盜竊罪、欺詐罪及一項企圖欺詐罪，下星期一在東區裁判法院應訊，以待控方稍後申請將案件轉介區域法院答辯。

廉署表示，31歲女被告劉蒨樺為一名藝人，她與一名女子打算經營醫學美容生意，並邀請另一名藝人投資。

其中兩項控罪指，女被告涉嫌偷竊該名藝人股東投資於醫學美容中心超過310萬元資金，並涉嫌向對方訛稱多筆共超過300萬元的款項已妥善用於購置醫學美容儀器，意圖詐騙而誘使對方不要求退還投資款項。

另外，女被告亦涉嫌向相關藝人股東訛稱公司裝修招致168萬元開支而耗盡其資金，企圖詐騙對方向被告再支付80萬元作為廣告費用。

title: 盧寵茂稱政府正全方位推行醫療體制改革　提升對貧急重危病人保障
news_content:
醫衞局聯同醫管局舉辦第二場公營醫療收費改革區議會簡介會，向二百多名區議員及地區人士，解說公營醫療服務收費改革的方案及目標，重點講解加強醫療保障的措施及實施安排。

醫衞局局長盧寵茂說，政府正全方位推行醫療體制改革，公營醫療收費改革除精準重整各項服務的資助水平外，亦著重加強醫療保障，目標是提升對「貧、急、重、危」病人的保障，讓公營醫療成為更大、更穩、更厚、更密的全民安全網。

醫管局代理行政總裁鄧耀鏗詳細介紹加強醫療保障的三大措施，即優化醫療費用減免機制、引入公營醫療全年收費上限一萬元和加強創新藥物器械的應用及資助。醫管局會繼續細化實施措施，精簡醫療費用減免和安全網申請程序，確保改革順利推行。

公營醫療服務新收費將於明年一月一日起正式生效，當局會繼續積極向市民解說各項細節。

title: 丘應樺：香港繼續發揮「引進來、走出去」的雙向平台作用
news_content:
商務及經濟發展局局長丘應樺表示，即使面對保護主義及單邊主義，尤其是所謂對等關稅的無理脅迫，香港會繼續善用「一國兩制」的優勢，鞏固提升國際貿易中心的地位，發揮「引進來、走出去」的雙向平台作用。

正在北京的丘應樺拜訪商務部多個單位，介紹香港在促進貿易及招商引資的最新發展，並交流意見。他表示，特區政府會加強招商引資，開拓更多新市場，同時更好融入國家發展大局，把握國家內循環帶來的機遇，積極擔當「超級聯繫人」及「超級增值人」的角色，以應對環球經貿格局的轉變。
 
丘應樺與當地港商代表會面，了解當地的最新發展和營商機遇，並就企業在複雜的國際大環境中面對的挑戰作出交流。他將於明日轉往卡塔爾參與由行政長官李家超率領的商貿代表團出訪中東。離港期間，陳百里將署任商務及經濟發展局局長。

title: 張國鈞稱逾千公司及聯會等簽署調解為先承諾　成績令人鼓舞
news_content:
律政司副司長張國鈞說，截至目前有超過1000間公司、組織、聯會和個人，簽署「調解為先」承諾書，包括各行各業的機構和人士，成績令人鼓舞。今年12月的法律周將有不同活動，例如調解講座等，讓公眾及業界更加理解，香港作為國際法律及爭議解決服務中心，所提供的服務與機遇。

張國鈞在「調解為先」承諾書活動上致辭表示，在香港這個「調解之都」，政府深知調解的好處及重要性，申訴專員公署在處理市民申訴時，很多時候都會透過調解來化解不滿及各種矛盾，充分體現調解在促進社會和諧中的角色。
 
隨著跨境婚姻越來越普遍，家事糾紛的調解，也不再局限於香港，去年底，律政司與廣東省司法廳及澳門行政法務司共同推出《粵港澳大灣區調解員名冊》，將有效促進粵港澳三地調解規則的銜接和人才連接，並推廣調解在大灣區的廣泛應用，完善大灣區多元糾紛解決機制。

title: 人行：研究推出金融支持消費指導性文件
news_content:
人民銀行表示，目前外部衝擊影響加大，世界經濟增長動能不足，貿易保護主義抬頭，地緣衝突持續存在，中國經濟持續回升向好的基礎還需要進一步穩固。

人行第一季度貨幣政策執行報告提到，將實施好適度寬鬆貨幣政策，發揮結構性貨幣政策工具作用，加大宏觀信貸政策指導力度，引導金融機構積極滿足各類主體多樣化資金需求，為擴大消費營造良好金融環境；推出金融促消費一攬子政策舉措，研究推出金融支持消費指導性文件，指導金融機構加強消費金融服務；持續優化消費信貸產品和服務。

另外，報告內專欄文章提及政府債務可持續性除了債務規模，更與政府資產負債結構、資產收益能力等密切相關。文章比較中國、美國及日本的債務，表示考慮到龐大的國有資產和較低的政府負債水平，中國政府債務擴張仍有可持續性，對於加強民生保障、完善收入分配、推動經濟轉型和動態平衡都有重要意義。

title: 一名男子確診感染猴痘　目前情況穩定
news_content:
一名過往健康良好的31歲男子確診感染猴痘，衞生防護中心初步調查顯示，患者潛伏期內曾在香港有高風險接觸，沒有資料顯示個案與本港早前錄得的其他猴痘確診個案有流行病學關連。

中心表示，這名男子上星期六開始出現水疱，本星期三到衞生署油麻地男性社會衞生科診所求診，目前情況穩定，將被安排到瑪嘉烈醫院接受隔離治療。中心提醒市民提高警覺，避免與懷疑感染猴痘的人士作密切身體接觸，同時強烈建議高風險目標群組人士接種猴痘疫苗。

中心會繼續就個案進行流行病學調查，並將個案通報世界衞生組織。

title: 警方打擊非法駕車作出租或載客取酬用途　拘捕一男一女
news_content:
警方在港島西區採取打擊非法駕駛汽車作出租或載客取酬用途行動，拘捕一男一女，扣查兩輛涉案私家車。

行動中，警員喬裝乘客，成功截獲兩輛懷疑涉嫌非法載客取酬的私家車。一名31歲本地男子及一名37歲內地女子涉嫌「利用汽車作非法出租或取酬載客用途」及「沒有第三者保險而使用車輛」被捕，被捕女子另外涉嫌「違反逗留條件」。

title: 代理：拆息下跌帶動周末預約睇樓增加
news_content:
與供樓相關的1個月銀行同業拆息跌穿2厘，按目前銀行H按息率1個月拆息+1.3厘，實際按息跌至3.24厘，進一步低於封頂息率3.5厘，減輕部分業主供樓壓力。

據香港置業統計，今個周末10大指標屋苑預約睇樓量有365組，按周升超過4%，連升第3周；中原地產十大屋苑預約睇樓量較上星期回升10.1%，創4星期新高；美聯物業15個指標屋苑預約睇樓量上升約4.5%，同樣連升3星期。

香港置業研究部董事王品弟表示，市場憧憬聯儲局年中重啟減息，港元拆息近期率先回落，加上西沙新盤幾輪銷情都理想，刺激市場睇樓活動。他預料，本月二手成交按月輕微增加5%以內，主要仍要視乎一手推盤部署。 

王品弟指出，其他發展商目前仍按兵不動，不急於推盤，加上市場仍受不確定因素影響，二手業主普遍願意提供議價空間，以新界區最大。

title: 有教徒期望新任教宗積極爭取和平　有學者相信中梵關係會邁向建交
news_content:
美國樞機主教普雷沃斯特當選新任教宗，名號良十四世。天主教香港教區表示，良十四世強調教會要建橋樑，建立共議同行、為窮人的教會，他呼籲信眾以愛與包容創造更和諧的世界。

有教徒期望新任教宗積極爭取和平；有學者相信中梵關係會邁向建交。

title: Mainland exports up even as US shipments plunge
news_content:
Mainland exports rose last month despite the trade war raging with the United States, official data showed on Friday ahead of talks between the world's top two economies towards easing the standoff.

Experts said that the forecast-smashing 8.1 percent rise indicated that Beijing was re-routing trade to Southeast Asia to mitigate US tariffs of up to 145 percent on Chinese imports imposed by US President Donald Trump.

Trade between the world's two largest economies has slumped since Trump imposed the tariffs and China responded with levies of 125 percent and other measures.

The year-on-year increase in exports of 8.1 percent in April was much higher than the 2 percent forecast by analysts in a poll last month.

The data from the Chinese customs bureau showed exports to Thailand, Indonesia and Vietnam surged by double digits, in what one analyst called a "structural repositioning" of trade.

"The global supply chain is being rerouted in real time," Stephen Innes of SPI Asset Management wrote in a note.

"Vietnam looks set to become China's offshore escape hatch for US-facing goods," he said.

"The manufacturing juggernaut is diverting flow wherever the tariff pain isn't."

Month-on-month exports to the United States plunged 17.6 percent.

Analysts at ANZ Research said the data revealed "it is difficult to exclude China from the global supply chain in the short term, considering China's role in manufacturing."

"The implied supply chain realignment as well as the expected outcome of Asia-US trade talks suggests no imminent collapse in China exports," they added.

Global markets have been on a roller-coaster since Trump began his tariff offensive which according to the White House was aimed at bringing back manufacturing to the United States.

While Trump has suspended for 90 days many of the most painful levies, those on China have remained in place.

Zhang Zhiwei, president and chief economist at Pinpoint Asset Management, also attributed the forecast-beating exports to transshipment through other countries.

But he also cited potential trade contracts that were signed before the tariffs were announced.

"I expect trade data will weaken in the next few months."

Imports were also being closely watched as a key gauge of consumer demand in China, which has remained sluggish.

They also beat expectations, dropping 0.2 percent, compared with the 6 percent slide analysts had estimated. (AFP)

title: 李國寶夫婦及李國章增持東亞
news_content:
東亞銀行公布，執行主席李國寶及配偶潘金翠、副主席李國章向大股東三井住友銀行購入5280萬股東亞股份，相當於已發行股份總數2%，每股作價9.64元，較今日收市價折讓逾13%，涉及金額約5.1億元。

交易完成後，三井住友銀行在東亞的持股將降至19.79%，繼續是最大股東；李國寶夫婦及其控制公司的持股將升至5.48%，李國章及其控制公司則持有1.6%。

李國寶及李國章表示，購買股份反映他們對東亞長期前景、戰略方向及為股東創造可持續價值的信心。

另外，東亞公布，延長李國寶執行主席任期3年，至2028年6月30日屆滿。

title: 廉署檢市值約2000萬元電子煙產品　拘捕16人
news_content: 廉署近日採取行動，瓦解一個非法銷售電子煙集團，透過行賄物流公司職員，協助集團經營的網店向客戶派送電子煙包裹，行動中拘捕16人，檢獲超過20萬件電子煙產品，市值約2000萬元，是電子煙禁令生效以來檢獲最大批的電子煙產品。

title: 衞生防護中心近日錄得4宗外地傳入登革熱感染個案
news_content:
衞生防護中心表示，本月2日至昨日錄得4宗外地傳入的登革熱感染個案，3宗病人於潛伏期內曾到馬來西亞，餘下1宗就曾到印尼。

中心調查發現，其中2宗由馬來西亞輸入的病例有流行病學關聯，分別涉及一名60歲有長期病患的男子和一名健康良好的37歲女子。男患者自4月28日起出現發燒和頭痛，本月2日到仁安醫院求診，需留院治療，目前情況穩定。女患者自4月27日起出現發燒和紅疹，先後於上月30日和本月3日，向兩名私家醫生求診，其後再轉到伊利沙伯醫院留醫，已經出院。
　　 
這兩名病人於4月21日至30日期間，與另外三人前往馬來西亞，他們在當地郊區遠足及露營，有人表示曾被蚊子叮咬，同行的另外三人目前沒有病徵，正接受醫學監察。

中心表示，截至昨日，今年錄得20宗外地傳入登革熱個案。去年共錄得161宗個案，包括156宗外地傳入及5宗本地感染個案。前年則錄得62宗外地傳入個案。

title: Woman, 28, arrested over concert bomb hoaxes
news_content:
Police said on Friday a 28-year-old woman has been arrested on suspicion of bomb hoaxes at Kai Tak Sports Park and misleading police officers. 

The arrest was made after officers received five reports on April 27 about suspected bombs at the main stadium, where Hong Kong singer Nicholas Tse's concert was under way with more than 40,000 fans in the audience.

So Chi-bing, chief inspector at Kowloon East regional crime unit, said officers conducted thorough searches and found no explosive devices. 

"Our investigation has confirmed these five bomb reports were false and that this person acted alone," he said.

"The motive is believed to be related to a private dispute with others over concert ticket matters."

So said the suspect works in a clerical role unrelated to the sports venue and the case is believed to be an isolated one. 

He urged the public to buy concert tickets only through official channels to avoid risks and potential data leaks.

The suspect, arrested in Kowloon City on Wednesday, will appear at the Kwun Tong Magistrates' Courts on Saturday.

title: 52歲男子本周三離開順安邨住所後失蹤
news_content:
52歲男子陳志偉本星期三下午離開順安邨住所後失蹤，家人昨日報案，警方呼籲市民提供消息。

失蹤男子身高約1.68米，體重約90公斤，肥身材，圓面型，黃皮膚及蓄短黑髮，最後露面時身穿黑色背心、黑色短褲、白色波鞋、白色鴨咀帽，戴黑色框眼鏡及攜有一個啡色袋。

任何人如有消息或曾見過他，請致電3661 0316，或電郵至rmpu-ke-2@police.gov.hk與東九龍總區失蹤人口調查組，或與任何一間警署聯絡。

title: 食環署本月中起實施一系列措施防範私人泳池聘用不合資格救生員
news_content:
食環署本月19日起實施一系列加強措施，進一步防範私人泳池聘用不合資格救生員。署方已向全港所有私人泳池持牌人發信，提醒他們配合和遵守相關新措施，以保障泳池使用者的安全。

根據新措施訂明的懲處機制，若持牌人一年內兩次被發現在泳池開放期間未有足夠合資格救生員當值，食環署會考慮暫時吊銷其牌照6個月，並要求持牌人向相關人士，如業主立案法團通報情況；一年內違規達三次，牌照可能會被取消，持牌人或其相關人士在12個月內亦不得在同一地點重新申請泳池牌照。

為確保持牌人妥善履行責任，食環署會通過牌照條件，明確規定持牌人在聘用救生員前須核對其身分證明文件，並將其救生章和救生手冊的副本存檔。食環署已制定救生員當值紀錄標準格式，要求持牌人按格式清楚記錄當值救生員的相關資料，並由持牌人委派的檢查人員及救生員簽名作實。食環署人員在巡查或跟進投訴時會按需要查閱有關紀錄，並跟進違規情況。

署方會對私人泳池加強突擊巡查，除了每月檢查和核實當值救生員資格外，亦會在7、8月泳季高峰期增加抽查頻次。如發現泳池沒有足夠合資格救生員當值，會即時採取跟進行動，包括要求持牌人立即關閉泳池，直至有足夠合資格救生員當值方可重開，以及向持牌人發出警告或提出檢控。

title: 路政署署長率領代表團在上海交流運輸基建工程創新經驗
news_content:
路政署署長邱國鼎今日率領署方代表團在上海舉辦「香港主要運輸基建項目分享會」，與內地同業會面，共同交流推進運輸基建工程的創新經驗，介紹了《跨越2030年的鐵路及主要幹道策略性研究》主要研究結果。

路政署即將就港深西部鐵路（洪水橋至前海）項目的勘查及設計工作向立法會申請撥款，項目將於今年下半年開展初步設計，邀請相關承建商及營運商提交意向書，就工程項目方案、採購和財務安排等提供意見，以便署方制訂合適的招標細則和條款。

政府爭取於2027至2028年批出工程合約和開展詳細設計及建造工程，目標於2034至2035年竣工並實現香港段和深圳段同步開通營運。

title: 良十四世主禮擔任教宗後首場彌撒
news_content:
良十四世主禮他擔任教宗後的首場彌撒。

彌撒在梵蒂岡西斯汀教堂舉行，130多名樞機主教參與。

良十四世開始彌撒時，提到承認自身罪過，並請求上帝寬恕，其他人與他一同詠唱。

title: 16 arrested over e-cigarette 'bribes'
news_content:
The ICAC said on Friday 16 people have been arrested on suspicion of being involved in the sale of illicit e-cigarettes during which bribes were suspected to have been offered.

The 12 men and four women were aged between 24 and 70. 

They include workers at a local logistics firm, suspected members of an illicit e-cigarette syndicate and their family members, and staff at an online shop.

Officers seized 600 boxes of goods worth HK$20 million.

The anti-graft body's acting principal investigator, Eric Chan, said the syndicate is suspected of offering HK$20 per parcel to the logistics workers not to inspect what's inside the packages.

Officers launched an investigation following a complaint and found the syndicate is suspected to have been operating for nearly a year.

Chan noted that since the ban on the sale of e-cigarettes took effect three years ago, the logistics firm has not been delivering them to customers.

"This logistics company actually implemented a policy to require its staff members to inspect each and every parcel," Chan said.

"I think it's an incident that concerns only individual staff members."

He said the arrests were made in the middle of last month and that the suspects are now out on bail. 

Advice from the Department of Justice is being sought as to what charges would be laid.

title: HK stocks end week with slight gain on eve of talks
news_content:
China and Hong Kong stocks struggled to gain traction on Friday, trimming the week's rise, as investors awaited the upcoming trade talks between the world's two largest economies.

In Hong Kong, the benchmark Hang Seng Index ended up 91.82 points, or 0.4 percent, at 22,867.74.

The Hang Seng China Enterprises Index edged up 0.1 percent to end at 8,308.83 while the Hang Seng Tech Index slipped 0.93 percent to end at 5,180.25. 

Across the border, Chinese stocks closed lower, with the benchmark Shanghai Composite Index down 0.3 percent to 3,342.

The Shenzhen Component Index closed 0.69 percent lower at 10,126.83.

Combined turnover for these two indices stood at about 1.19 trillion yuan, down from 1.29 trillion yuan on the previous trading day

The mood among investors has improved substantially since the US president unveiled his "Liberation Day" blitz last month, sending markets spinning and fuelling global recession fears.

Several countries have lined up to hold talks with Washington to avert the worst of the duties that range from 10 percent to as high as 145 percent on China – Trump's main target.

On Thursday, Britain became the first to announce a deal that reduces tariffs on British cars and lifts them on steel and aluminium, while in return Britain will open up markets to US beef and other farm products.

But analysts said traders were more excited about the Republican leader's comments on the upcoming talks with China in which he hinted at an easing of the stiff measures aimed at the world's number two economy. That could see Beijing dial back some of its own 125 percent tariffs on US goods.

Trump said he thought the negotiations would be "substantive" and when asked if reducing the levies was a possibility, he said "it could be".

"We're going to see. Right now you can't get any higher. It's at 145 percent so we know it's coming down. I think we're going to have a very good relationship."

Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer are set to meet Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng in Switzerland on Saturday and Sunday, the first talks between the superpowers since Trump unveiled his tariffs.

Stephen Innes, of SPI Asset Management, said: "As important as the UK deal was, Trump's tone on China was the real signal for markets – and it handed the risk-on baton straight to Asia in a friendly, optimistic fashion.

"The president all but greenlit the idea that the days of punitive standoff might give way to negotiated momentum."

Asian markets extended the week's rally and tracked gains on Wall Street.

Tokyo jumped more than 1 percent on hopes for Japan's trade talks.Seoul edged down with Mumbai and Bangkok. But Sydney, Wellington, Manila and Jakarta all advanced with London, Paris and Frankfurt. (AFP/Xinhua)

title: 在岸人民幣低收106點子　創逾1星期新低
news_content:
在岸人民幣創逾1星期新低，收市報7.2461兌1美元，較上日跌106點子。中間價亦跌至半個月低位，與市場預測偏離水平擴至近500點子。

分析認為，中美經貿高層會談在即，市場觀望情緒升溫，若能實現部分關稅下調，人民幣有望階段性反彈，但美元亦可能轉強，將限制人民幣升值空間。

title: 海關偵破3宗涉遠洋船走私案　估計市值1.2億元
news_content:
海關偵破3宗涉嫌利用遠洋船走私貨物的案件，檢獲大批懷疑走私電子貨物及零件，估計市值約1億2千萬元。案件仍在調查中，不排除會有人被捕。

海關透過情報分析及風險評估，上月30日及本月1日，在葵涌貨櫃碼頭鎖定兩艘準備由香港分別前往巴基斯坦及泰國的遠洋船作檢查，並在5個貨櫃內檢獲包括中央處理器、電腦主機、伺服器、硬碟和電腦配件等懷疑走私電子貨物及零件。

title: 通訊局批准電視廣播有限公司股權結構變動申請
news_content:
通訊局批准本地免費電視持牌機構電視廣播有限公司，就涉及Young Lion Holdings Limited（YLH）的股份轉讓而提出的股權結構變動申請。

有關交易於今日完成，無綫的股權結構變動隨即生效。在交易完成後，YLH仍然是無綫的主要股東，無綫的行政主席許濤則成為YLH持有無綫25.02%的有表決權股份的最終表決控權人。

YLH原本透過其全資附屬公司，間接持有無綫25.02%的有表決權股份。通過有關交易，YLH的現有股東將部分股份，轉讓予許濤控制的公司Vanilla Sky Limited。

通訊局信納無綫在股權變動完成後，會繼續遵守《廣播條例》及其免費電視牌照內對其適用的規管要求，並會按照牌照條款履行其投資和節目承諾，故批准有關申請。

title: Congee chain axings hard to swallow for staff
news_content:
Axed employees of Ocean Empire Food Shop are urging its owners to show up and address the issues of unpaid wages, pension and severance payments after the local congee restaurant chain closed all its outlets and ceased operations after 33 years in business earlier this week in one fell swoop. 

The Eating Establishment Employees General Union organised a consultation meeting on Friday afternoon to clarify any questions that the sacked staff may have about their rights and offer assistance. 

Among the ex-staff in attendance was Yau, who oversaw the restaurant chain’s production line.

She said the line had lost half its staff over the past three years. 

She said the company had been doing badly for quite some time, with suppliers visiting the office weeks before the closure asking for payments.

“Why are the owners doing this to workers who gave everything to Ocean Empire?” she spoke with raw feelings

“Many of us worked here for over 30 years and were not even given a few months of pension," Yau said amid complaints by some staff who said the company had deducted mandatory provident fund (MPF) contributions from salaries but had not paid them to the workers' schemes.

"We have spent decades, the best years of our lives, serving the company, but the owners just disappeared irresponsibly.” 

Another former employee, Li, said her last month’s salary and MPF payments are overdue. 

She said she was disappointed with Hong Kong’s employment protections after coming from Guangdong to work here for just one year.

The union’s chief secretary, Wong Pit-man, said the union will work closely with the Labour Department on follow-up actions.

Senior manager Jackie Lee from the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority also attended the meeting, and pledged to help workers recover the unpaid MPF contributions.

He noted that the company has about HK$570,000 in overdue MPF contributions for all its staff between January and March. 

Also among those attending was Anthony Yau, vice-chairman of the Federation of Trade Unions, who said affected workers can also use the party’s online platform to find new jobs.

title: 習近平出席俄羅斯紅場閱兵儀式　普京與老兵握手
news_content:
俄羅斯於莫斯科紅場舉行紀念蘇聯偉大衛國戰爭勝利80周年慶典閱兵儀式。正在當地國事訪問的國家主席習近平出席，與俄羅斯總統普京共同步入會場，並排觀看。

閱兵式包括俄羅斯國旗升旗儀式、為犧牲的英雄默哀一分鐘、傳統的徒步方陣檢閱、軍事裝備展示及空中飛行表演，普京在儀式上與戰爭老兵握手。當參加閱兵儀式的中國人民解放軍儀仗隊通過紅場，習近平向他們致意。

普京致辭時表示，國家以數百萬人的生命為代價，為全人類贏得自由與和平，俄羅斯高度評價、並將永遠記得頑抗敵人的戰士、盟軍及勇敢的中國人民為勝利作出的貢獻。他強調真理與正義站在俄羅斯一邊，俄羅斯始終在軍事與和平行動中、在實現戰略目標中，以及在國家各項任務中，團結一致，希望俄羅斯人秉承老兵保家衛國的決心。

空中方隊接受檢閱後，儀式落下帷幕，普京及出席的各國領導人共同向位於亞歷山大花園的無名烈士墓敬獻花圈。

title: 夏寶龍在澳門與商會及多個團體見面　了解民生社情
news_content:
中央港澳工作辦公室主任、國務院港澳事務辦公室主任夏寶龍在澳門展開第二日的考察調研，下午到達政府總部。

在行政長官岑浩輝及官員陪同下，夏寶龍與中華總商會、工聯、街總、婦聯、歸僑、青聯等10多個團體的代表，舉行座談會。了解澳門政府施政與民生社情的發展和意見。

在早上，夏寶龍主要留在入住的新竹苑，與3名前任行政長官，包括全國政協副主席何厚鏵，賀一誠及崔世安，交流和研判澳門的最新情況。

title: 中方就歐洲議會通過涉藏決議向歐方提出嚴正交涉
news_content:
中國駐歐盟使團對歐洲議會通過涉藏決議表示強烈不滿，堅決反對，並向歐方提出嚴正交涉。

發言人批評，歐洲議會有關決議罔顧事實，就涉藏等問題散布虛假信息，抹黑中國形象，粗暴干涉中國內政；敦促歐洲議會正視事實，充分認清涉藏問題的重要性及敏感性，切實尊重中方的核心利益和重大關切，停止以人權等為藉口干涉中國內政，停止向反華分裂勢力發出錯誤信號，以實際行動維護中歐關係健康穩定發展大局。

title: 本港二手樓價按周轉跌近0.3%　結束2周連升
news_content:
反映本港二手樓價走勢的中原城市領先指數(CCL)最新報136.34點，按周跌0.27%，結束2周連升，仍處於逾8年半低位，反映復活節長假期當周市況。今年樓價累計下跌0.94%，較去年政府撤辣前跌近4.7%，較歷史高位回落近29%。

大型屋苑樓價按周微跌不足0.1%；中小型單位跌0.11%；大型單位跌約1%，結束2周連升。4區樓價個別發展，港島和新界西按周分別跌1.51%和0.55%，九龍和新界東則分別升0.19%和2.13%。

中原地產表示，近期二手樓市拉鋸，業主態度強硬，而買家不願追價，雖然港元拆息顯著回落，令H按息年半以來再次跌穿封頂息率，加上內地減息降準救市等消息，對樓市有正面支持，但發展商趁機積極部署開售多個新盤，預計二手樓價繼續向下，今季仍有約2.5%下跌空間。

title: 港股高收91點　連升7日　本周累升1.6%
news_content:
港股反覆靠穩，連升7個交易日。恒生指數全日高低波幅約215點，收市報22867點，升91點，升幅0.4%。主板成交額約1616億元。

科技指數一度跌逾2%，收市報5180點，跌幅0.93%。晶片股受壓，華虹半導體及中芯國際業績後分別跌近8%及5%，是表現最差兩隻科指成份股。ATMXJ個別發展，表現較好的小米及阿里巴巴升逾1%。

港元銀行同業拆息持續向下，供樓相關1個月拆息跌穿2厘，本地地產股造好，新地及恒地升5%至6%，是表現最好兩隻藍籌股。

內需股及金融股個別發展，周大福及吉利汽車升近4%至5%。三桶油亦上升。

全星期計，恒指累計上升1.6%，科指累計跌1.2%。

title: 入境處打擊非法勞工　拘21人包括13名以旅客身分入境內地人
news_content:
入境處採取反非法勞工行動，拘捕21人，包括13名非法勞工，及8名涉嫌聘請非法勞工的裝修公司負責人、業主和住戶等。

行動由本月6日至今日、一連4日進行，入境處鎖定全港幾個新入伙的屋苑，巡查293個單位或處所。

被捕的13名非法勞工全部來自內地，以旅客身分入境，涉嫌來港從事不同類型工作，包括度尺、裝修工程和潔淨服務等，日薪由100至500港元，以現金出糧。

另外被捕的8人，全部是香港居民，包括裝修公司負責人、業主和住戶。入境處表示，有個別人士在網上社交平台找內地裝修公司承包工程，當中部分非法勞工相信是由內地裝修公司安排來港。

入境處又說，有被捕懷疑僱主因為貪方便及節省成本，找內地的同鄉來港從事非法工作。處方表示，如果明知而聘請非法勞工，又或者無採取任何切實可行步驟去確保這些裝修工人可以在港合法受僱，例如查閱對方身份證，而容許非法勞工在港工作，可能會涉及協助及教唆他人違反逗留條件而被捕。

title: 中方：能否恢復日本水產品進口要基於持續獨立取樣監測一系列數據
news_content:
中國海關總署昨天應約與日方就日本水產品的安全問題進行技術交流，就如何加強水產品的檢驗監測、確保質量安全深入交換意見。

外交部發言人林劍表示，中方強調，能否恢復日本水產品進口，要基於中方持續獨立取樣監測一系列科學數據，而且日方應切實採取措施，有效保障水產品質量安全。日方就說，高度重視中方和中國民眾關切，再次確認持續進行對排海國際監測和利害攸關國獨立取樣監測，並將確保日本輸華水產品符合中方規准。

林劍重申，中方反對日本單方面啟動排海的立場沒有改變，將繼續會同國際社會敦促日方切實履行自身承諾，確保福島核污水排海始終處於嚴格的國際監督之下，這是管控排海風險的有效措施。

title: 海皇粥店員工申索總金額料逾800萬元　有員工哽咽促僱主付欠款
news_content:
海皇粥店全線結業，並終止僱傭合約。飲食業職工總會下午舉行員工諮詢大會，協助員工進行申索及跟進詳情，積金局代表亦到場講解強積金追討情況，並為員工即場登記及提供資訊。

工會表示，海皇粥店共有7間分店，約100名員工受影響，截止今日，估算員工申索金額超過800萬元，主要涉及4月份欠薪、遺散費、代通知金、強積金欠款等。有員工指，不少員工均有10年至20年或以上年資，形容盡力為公司工作，批評僱主的做法不妥；有員工哽咽，要求僱主站出來面對員工，及支付欠款。

工聯會副理事長、權益委員會主任丘燿誠表示，若僱主簽署「無力償還書」、交出員工月薪、假期日數等資料，申索程序將較快，但無奈未能聯絡僱主。

積金局高級經理李樂表示，海皇未為約130名員工繳交去年12月的附加費及今年1月至3月的強積金供款及附加費，涉及金額約57萬元，希望與員工核對糧單及假期數目等，以協助追討強積金欠款，強調不應忽視5%強積金供款，認為屬退休權益，員工有權利追討。

title: HK Catholic Church rallies around new pope
news_content:
Cardinal Stephen Chow has called on the faithful in Hong Kong to join in praying for and blessing the newly elected Pope Leo XIV who has emphasised a need for people throughout the world to show love through dialogue and compassion and build a church that can help the poor.

Chow's call came after the 69-year-old Augustinian priest, whose name is Robert Francis Prevost, became the first of 267 popes in the 2,000-year history of the Catholic Church to be elected from the United States.

Speaking in a statement on behalf of the Hong Kong Catholic Church, Chow said the new pope emphasises "bridge building, a synodal church and a church for the poor".

"He urges the faithful all over the world to make a collective effort in creating a more harmonious world with love and inclusivity," Chow said in the statement. 

"Together with the faithful, Cardinal Stephen Chow, Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Hong Kong, gives thanks to God for choosing Pope Leo XIV. 

"They pray that God will bless him abundantly in his future ministry as the Supreme Pastor of the Roman Catholic Church."

The diocese's remarks were echoed by a local scholar, who also noted that the new pope could assist socially-disadvantaged communities around the world in a very practical manner given the high regard in which he is held by cardinals from around the world in electing him. 

Shue Yan University's Anthony Lam said the American was a favourite as his election only required four rounds of voting held over a relatively short period, indicating that the cardinals reached a consensus quickly. 

Lam, an assistant professor in the department of journalism and communication, added that Pope Leo's more than 20 years of work in Peru as a missionary and then archbishop of Chiclayo means he has a good understanding about the plight facing socially-advantaged communities.

"He was working for the poor in South America, and it must have been a hard experience," he told RTHK.  

"He would have encountered issues of hunger or poverty, or individuals who did not get the opportunity to develop themselves, as well as the plight brought by such deprivation. 

"These problems are very real; they are real difficulties in life, so I believe if he tries to solve such issues, he will adopt a very practical approach to truly help those in difficult situations."

For years, there had long been a taboo against electing a US pope, given the geopolitical power already wielded by the United States in the secular sphere, and Lam believes the new pope's election can bring back balance to the bias.

Lam said Pope Leo's choice in settling on his papal name is a tribute paid to the last pope who took the name, Pope Leo XIII, who focused much of his papacy on labour rights as well as social justice.

"I think his election will help bring balance back to the United States to counter the current hegemonic US President Donald Trump."

Pope Leo XIV was born in 1955 in Chicago. He was appointed Bishop of Chiclayo in Peru in 2015, before becoming a cardinal in 2023. From 2023 until his election as pontiff, he served as the Prefect of the Dicastery for Bishops under the Holy See.

Chow's call came after the 69-year-old Augustinian priest, whose name is Robert Francis Prevost, became the first of 267 popes in the 2,000-year history of the Catholic Church to be elected from the United States.

Speaking in a statement on behalf of the Hong Kong Catholic Church, Chow said the new pope, who was born in Chicago, emphasizes "bridge building, a synodal church and a church for the poor".

"He urges the faithful all over the world to make a collective effort in creating a more harmonious world with love and inclusivity," Chow said in the statement. 

"Together with the faithful, Cardinal Stephen Chow, Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Hong Kong, gives thanks to God for choosing Pope Leo XIV. 

"They pray that God will bless him abundantly in his future ministry as the Supreme Pastor of the Roman Catholic Church."

The diocese's remarks were echoed by a local scholar, who also noted that the new pope could assist socially-disadvantaged communities around the world in a very practical manner given the high regard in which he is held by cardinals from around the world in electing him. 

Shue Yan University's Anthony Lam said the American was a favourite as his election only required four rounds of voting held over a relatively short period, indicating that the cardinals reached a consensus quickly. 

Lam, an assistant professor in the department of journalism and communication, added that Pope Leo's more than 20 years of work in Peru as a missionary and then archbishop of Chiclayo means he has a good understanding about the plight facing socially-advantaged communities.

"He was working for the poor in South America, and it must have been a hard experience," he told RTHK.  

"He would have encountered issues of hunger or poverty, or individuals who did not get the opportunity to develop themselves, as well as the plight brought by such deprivation. 

"These problems are very real; they are real difficulties in life, so I believe if he tries to solve such issues, he will adopt a very practical approach to truly help those in difficult situations."

For years, Lam said, there had long been a taboo against electing a US pope, given the geopolitical power already wielded by the United States in the secular sphere.

He believes the new pope's election can bring balance to the bias.

Lam said Pope Leo's choice in settling on his papal name is a tribute paid to the last pope who took the name, Pope Leo XIII, who focused much of his papacy to labour rights as well as social justice.

"I think his election will help bring balance back to the United States to counter the current hegemonic US president Donald Trump."

Pope Leo XIV was born in 1955 in Chicago. He was appointed Bishop of Chiclayo in Peru in 2015, before becoming a cardinal in 2023. From 2023 until his election as pontiff, he served as the Prefect of the Dicastery for Bishops under the Holy See.

title: Lo eases fears over fee markups by private hospitals
news_content:
Secretary for Health Lo Chung-mau said on Friday he thinks greater transparency with private hospital charges wouldn't cause the sector to mark up prices. 

The Health Bureau is proposing legal changes that would make it mandatory for private hospitals, clinics and day procedure centres to list the fees they charge for services or give a price range, as well as past fees.

If doctors would end up charging 20 percent or more than what's listed, a written explanation would be needed. 

Violators would be subject to a fine, the amount for which will be settled on after officials consult the sector. 

At a health services panel meeting at the legislature, several lawmakers expressed concern that the proposals would cause doctors to mark up charges in their list of fees in an attempt to stop issues from cropping up. 

But Lo said he disagreed because he thinks doing so would only drive patients away.

"Patients may not want to agree with such a level of fees," he said.

"If you're to exaggerate all the fees – say, a patient is told he may have to fork out HK$1 million just to deal with a problem with the bladder – then I think the patient won't take the service."

Several lawmakers, including the DAB's Edward Leung and Roundtable's Michael Tien, called on officials to set deterrent fines for overcharging.

Leung even suggested private practitioners should be subject to an outright fine, rather than be required to give a written explanation if they charge 20 percent more than the listed fee.

Lo, however, said medical procedures are often complicated and hard to predict, and it would be unreasonable to issue a fine that way.

He said patients can file complaints when faced with overcharging in future and that a written explanation would help all sides.

Leung also asked whether there would be a price list for cancer treatments, but Lo said what would be listed in such cases would be based on treatment methods instead of the types of disease.

That's because cancer, for example, can be treated in a variety of ways.

Lo stressed that the government plans to table a bill to the legislature next year and implement the proposals in phases.

title: 立法加強私營醫療機構收費透明度　盧寵茂指設立具阻嚇性罰款水平
news_content:
醫務衞生局局長盧寵茂表示，如果私營醫療服務收費持續攀升，會令保費水漲船高，減低市民購買醫保的意慾，同時進一步加重公營醫療的壓力，難以應對人口老化的挑戰，當局分析海外和本地情況後，提出3項立法建議，加強收費透明度。

在立法會一個委員會上，工聯會陳穎欣問到，私營醫療機構一旦更新價目，需要向外公布的限期；民建聯梁熙關注罰款水平需要具阻嚇力。

對於政府提出，最終收費超出預算，例如高出20%需要提供書面解釋，實政圓桌田北辰認為太寬鬆，建議降至10%以下。

盧寵茂回應，會設立具阻嚇性的罰款水平，但強調醫療程序有很多不可預期因素，假如院方提出的解釋合理，相信市民也會接受，有需要可向醫委會和消委會等渠道投訴。他又指，如果收費超出預算，醫院需要提供書面解釋的門檻再降低，可能導致醫生一開始就調高預算水平，對病人亦無好處。

新民黨陳家珮關注，立法後不同私營醫療機構會否合謀定價；選委界陳凱欣認為，政府2016年已推出「提高私家醫院收費透明度先導計劃」，現時已有多間私家醫院參與，並涵蓋不同項目，但要至明年才提交條例草案再逐步落實，時間太慢，促請加快步伐。

盧寵茂指出，會持續監察所有私營機構收費是否出現異常，有需要會展開調查，又指公營醫療收費改革和今次立法建議屬兩條腿走路，當局會積極推進立法工作，加快落實提高私營醫療收費透明度。

title: 美國現任及多位前總統祝賀教宗　秘魯總統讚良十四世謙遜及有愛心
news_content:
梵蒂岡樞機團選出新一任教宗，名號為良十四世，多方祝賀。中國天主教「一會一團」，向新任教宗良十四世致賀電，對他當選教宗表示祝賀。 

1955年生於芝加哥的良十四世，是歷來首位來自美國的教宗。美國總統特朗普及副總統萬斯祝賀良十四世，其中特朗普形容，見到第一位來自北美的教宗是莫大榮幸。本身是天主教徒的美國前總統拜登說願主保佑良十四世，他與夫人吉爾祝願對方事事順利。另外三名前總統奧巴馬、喬治布殊及克林頓亦祝賀良十四世。

良十四世長年在秘魯傳教。秘魯總統博魯阿爾特說，良十四世多年來在秘魯生活及服務，2015年入籍，讚揚他以謙遜、愛心及堅定信仰與民眾分享人生，親近最需要幫助的人，這份恩情在大家心中留下難以磨滅的印記，祝願良十四世蒙受神的庇佑，完成使命。

澳洲總理阿爾巴內塞衷心祝賀良十四世，又說澳洲政府期待在對方任內，繼續與梵蒂岡保持密切關係。澳洲將於2028年主辦一次重要的天主教會議，阿爾巴內塞邀請良十四世訪問澳洲。

亞洲各地的天主教徒，亦紛紛向良十四世送上祝福，包括世界第三多天主教徒的菲律賓、南韓及印尼等。

title: 電子煙網店涉行賄物流公司職員派遞裝電子煙包裹　廉署拘16人
news_content:
廉政公署偵破一個涉及貪污的非法銷售電子煙集團，一間銷售電子煙的網店涉嫌行賄一間本地物流公司的職員，協助派遞裝有電子煙的包裹，有16人被捕。

行動中，廉署檢獲歷來最大批的電子煙產品，涉及近600箱貨物，包括約20萬件電子煙彈及近3萬個電子煙機，市值2千萬元。

被捕的12男4女，年齡介乎24至70歲，分別是這個非法集團7名成員，包括一名40歲集團男主腦，他父母、太太、3名網店職員，以及一間具規模本地物流公司的9名職員。廉署相信今次行動已切斷該不法集團的供應鏈。

廉署執行處首席調查主任陳卓熙表示，2022年4月禁止銷售電子煙法例生效之後，該物流公司已經禁止為客戶派送電子煙，但非法集團以每件包裹20元作為酬勞，涉嫌賄賂物流公司職員於收取相關包裹時不檢查是否違禁品，瞞天過海將包裹派送給收件人或指定空置單位，每日合共會派送約200件包裹，犯罪集團每月銷售收入可達200萬元。

衞生署控煙酒辦公室主任封螢表示，今次檢獲的電子煙數目除了數量龐大，尼古丁含量亦非常高，一個煙彈等同40包煙，部分產品更寫明開封後要在15天內用完，即等於每日吸食3包煙，而且售價相對低，對青少年禍害非常大。

title: HK has 'unique common law role' in Mideast connections
news_content:
Law Society president Roden Tong said on Friday Hong Kong can act as a connector between Middle East businesses and the mainland as the SAR is the only common law jurisdiction in China. 

His comment comes ahead of his visit to Qatar and Kuwait on Saturday as part of a delegation led by Chief Executive John Lee. 

Speaking on RTHK’s Backchat programme, Tong said the society will be signing memorandums of understanding with the Qatar International Center for Conciliation and Arbitration, the Qatar Lawyers Association and the Kuwait Bar Association. 

He said Hong Kong’s role is unique in being the only city in China that has a common law system as well as being the only Chinese and English bilingual common law jurisdiction in the world. 

Tong also said Hong Kong’s legal system is aligned with Qatar and Kuwait in some unique respects. 

“In Qatar and Kuwait, they have a mixture of different laws," he said. 

However, "one thing is very unique: when they do international business, they adopt common law so we are speaking the same language", he said. 

"So literally, we can actually use these unique advantages to contribute back to our country when they actually do business from overseas to the mainland and also help our mainland counterparts to actually [do business overseas]."

Tong said all commercial activities are intertwined with the law and require the support of professional legal services. 

“For example, if there is a company in Qatar or Kuwait that wants to do business with the mainland, they come to Hong Kong and collaborate with a Hong Kong enterprise and go into the Greater Bay Area, they literally can apply common law in their contract,” Tong said, referring to the favourable free-trade treatment the city receives under the Closer Economic Partnership Arrangement with the mainland that can benefit Middle East firms. 

“[If they are so unfortunate as to have a dispute] then they can even actually apply for Hong Kong as the seat of arbitration." 

Tong said Hong Kong has the international expertise that can cope as there are nearly 1,700 registered foreign lawyers and more than 80 registered foreign law firms in the city.

title: 分析稱美國關稅措施對中國出口影響下半年較明顯出現
news_content:
內地4月美元計價出口按年升8.1%，增速比3月減慢4.3個百分點，仍好過市場預期。進口跌幅顯著收窄4.1個百分點至0.2%，市場原先估計跌幅擴大。上月貿易順差約962億美元。

上海商業銀行研究部主管林俊泓認為，內地上月出口好過預期，可能由於關稅戰醞釀已久，外商早前累積的庫存已經消耗，加上內地對亞洲其他國家出口仍然維持高增長，部分抵銷對美貿易減少的影響，因此出口數字不會立即急劇下跌，可能要到今年下半年才會見到較明顯的影響。

他預料，美國關稅措施影響深遠，因對美貿易商普遍邊際利潤率較低，假設關稅稅率降至50%至65%，仍拖累內地整體出口約10%。

林俊泓說，考慮到當前美國暫緩對其他國家徵收較高稅率的對等關稅，並開展貿易談判，同時近期航運指標亦未見起色，預期內地短期內不會出現首季搶出口情況，今季出口可能會維持低單位數增長。進口則要視乎商品價格走勢，若果未來物價保持平穩，今季進口較大機會在正負之間徘徊。

title: 科大成立人工智能研究院　陳茂波冀為人工智能商業化開闢新途徑
news_content:
財政司司長陳茂波表示，政府相信人工智能的巨大潛力，所以在預算案提出將人工智能發展為核心產業的願景。當局的目標是在「AI+」策略下，將人工智能融入各個產業，以抓住未來的機會，又強調本港需要專注於五大關鍵支柱，包括運算能力、先進演算法、高質量數據、資本及人才。有關願景需要政府、產業、學術界、研究和投資部門的密切合作去實現。

陳茂波出席科大成立發展人工智能的研究院開幕儀式致辭表示，人工智能提高生產力，改變工業生產流程，令政府和企業更有效率。他形容研究院的成立是提升人工智慧創新領先地位的一個重要舉措。研究院匯集來自多個領域的人才和資源，在數據和人工智能方面，提供豐富的學術專業知識和強大的基礎研究。政府希望研究院能夠成為平台，為人工智能的應用場景和商業化開闢新途徑，為香港不斷發展的創新生態系統和人工智慧的進步作出貢獻。

科大表示，是響應特區政府全力發展人工智能為關鍵產業而成立相關研究院，將整合具身智能、生成式人工智能及先進超級運算等技術，推動跨學科協作，促進新質生產力以迎接人工世代。科大表示，研究院將致力構建完整的人工智能生態系統，加強產學研合作，並通過中學拓展計劃，培育新一代人工智能人才。

研究院亦計劃培訓超過100名博士生，並匯聚不同專業領域的學術人員，為科大畢學生裝備前沿理論知識及實用的業界技能。

title: Congee chain 'irresponsible in way it treated staff'
news_content:
A unionist lawmaker on Friday criticised the owner of a local congee chain – Ocean Empire Food Shop – for acting irresponsibly by notifying staff of its closure only at the very last minute.

The owner, Ocean Empire International, informed all its employees late on Wednesday in a letter that it had shut down all outlets and offices and terminated their contracts of all employees the same day.

Speaking on an RTHK radio programme, Lam Chun-sing pointed out the closure showed that the catering sector is facing a lot of challenges.

He said the owner could have made the announcement earlier.

"Indeed it seems rather irresponsible as the company issued the notice in this manner," Lam said. 

"It's not as if it only found out it had to close at the last minute; it likely knew about it three or four months in advance.

"It should have informed the employees earlier about when the final payday would be, whether any unused annual leave would be fully compensated and then proceeded with the closure. 

"Then it would have given colleagues time to prepare and start looking for other jobs earlier."

In the letter, the management wrote that employees could turn to the Labour Department for assistance about Protection of Wages on Insolvency Fund for ex-gratia payments.

Workers can apply to the fund if a company is unable to pay back its employees after liquidation.

Lam expressed concern over whether employees would be able to get back the full amount of their wage arrears even if they applied to the fund as it has a ceiling of HK$80,000.

The Labour Department said at least 80 staff members have sought help over such issues as outstanding wages, which amount to more than HK$8 million.

The Eating Establishment Employees General Union has received more than 100 requests for assistance, including about 20 imported workers. They were owed up to HK$10 million in total.

Lam noted that some imported workers have to pay tens of thousands of dollars to work in the SAR, and they have to return home within 14 days after the termination of their employment. 

He called on the government to work with mainland authorities on the issue of agency fees as those who have been terminated within a short period upon arrival will undoubtedly suffer huge losses.

The general union's Chiu Kwun-chung said on the same show that the restaurant has neither paid wages since last month nor contributed to staff's mandatory provident funds since January even though it had deducted the amounts from their incomes.

He said the company should offer details on the matter, instead of breaking the news in the form of a letter, which he considered as anything but ideal.

Chiu added that the owner should offer up information, such as staff's work attendance as well as leave records, to enable them to apply for ex-gratia payments.

title: 運輸署稱政策立場清晰　的士服務要改善網約車平台要規管
news_content:
運輸署發言人表示，樂意聆聽的士業界的意見，並正安排會面，保持緊密溝通。政府的政策立場一貫清晰，的士服務要改善，網約車平台要規管，非法「白牌車」的經營要依法打擊。政府將持續依法打擊非法出租或取酬載客活動，保障市民的安全及利益。

發言人示，政府近年推出不同措施，銳意提升的士服務質素，包括透過的士車隊制度，引入系統化管理、善用科技。的士車隊營辦商正積極籌備，政府期望各車隊盡快投入營運，引入優質的士服務。

另外，警方一直採取針對性執法行動，打擊非法出租或取酬載客活動。同時，政府正研究進一步完善法例，包括取消相關司機的駕駛資格，以及如有足夠證據顯示相關車輛確曾涉及非法出租或取酬載客的罪行，即使未能確認司機身份，仍可扣押涉事車輛。政府會適時向立法會提交修例建議。

title: Taxi groups push for fast curbs on ride-hailing ops
news_content:
Representatives from more than 20 taxi groups staged a protest outside West Kowloon Government Offices on Friday to demand a crackdown on illegal ride-hailing services. 

Chow Kwok-keung, chairman of the Hong Kong Taxi and Public Light Bus Association, said the sector's representatives hope to meet with officials and accelerate the introduction of laws that regulate ride-hailing platforms. 

He said ride-hailing services are causing a drop in income of about 20 percent for taxi drivers.

When asked if the taxi trade plans to hold a strike if officials don’t provide a satisfactory response, Chow said there is no need for such action as drivers are already disengaging from their usual work routine because they feel earnings are insufficient to constitute a living wage. 

“The next step, as I have mentioned, is to invite taxi associations to sign authorized letters, which we will then submit to the Chief Executive’s Office for official attention," Chow said.

"Currently, both taxi owners and drivers feel there is no law governing the illegal carriage of passengers. 

"That’s the biggest problem.”  

The Hong Kong Tele-call Taxi Association earlier threatened a citywide strike, urging officials to take immediate action on the issue. 

It called off the strike following a meeting with transport officials, with Chief Executive John Lee warning that it would be against public interest and could be exploited by people with bad motives.

title: 中美首4月貿易總值人民幣計跌逾2%　佔中國外貿總值逾10%
news_content:

title: 易通行周日凌晨2時至上午8時系統維護　訊息通知及付款增值暫停

發言人表示，期間駕駛人士可如常使用政府收費隧道和青沙管制區，「易通行」系統會記錄駕駛人士通過隧道的實際時間，並以此收取隧道費，但登入用戶戶口查詢隧道費交易、付款或增值指定儲值戶口等服務將會暫停。

署方會督導系統保養承辦商和隧道費服務商盡快完成工作，並在服務恢復正常後作出公布。系統會在完成維護後，處理用戶於系統維護期間錄得的隧道費交易，以及恢復發送電子訊息通知；用戶亦可在服務恢復正常後登入戶口查看交易詳情。

用戶如有需要，可提前處理付款及增值。如有查詢，可致電24小時服務熱線3853 7333。

title: 習近平同瑞典國王互致賀電　中方高度重視中瑞關係發展
news_content:
國家主席習近平同瑞典國王卡爾十六世就中瑞建交75周年互致賀電。

習近平指出，建交75年來，中瑞關係總體保持平穩，兩國經貿、科技、教育、人文等合作不斷拓展，取得積極成果。中方高度重視中瑞關係發展，願同卡爾十六世一起努力，以兩國建交75周年為新起點，引領兩國增進政治互信、深化務實合作、密切人員往來，共同支持多邊主義和自由貿易，為兩國人民帶來更多福祉，為世界和平繁榮作出更大貢獻。

title: 本港學者料新任教宗教普雷沃斯沿過去路線處理中梵關係　邁向建交
news_content:
69歲的美國樞機主教普雷沃斯特當選新任教宗，名號良十四世。研究中梵關係的宗教學者、樹仁大學新聞與傳播學系兼任助理教授林瑞琪表示，經過四輪投票就選出新任教宗，反映有份投票的樞機主教很快取得共識。而近代的教宗選舉，由於公眾對候選人有較多資訊，所以選出新任教宗的時間較以往快。

林瑞琪說，普雷沃斯特在美國出生，多年來在秘魯傳教，為較貧苦階層工作，相信他的工作經驗，令他更了解面對貧窮和飢餓等困境的人士，就協助他們提出具體方法。

林瑞琪又估計，普雷沃斯特在中梵關係上，會沿著若望保祿二世及本篤十六世的路線，相信會邁向建交。因為教廷由1971年開始沒有再派大使到台北，只派遣代辦，反映教廷亦準備中梵建交，如何達成則由雙方慢慢磨合，但相信大方向不會變。

普雷沃斯特是歷來首位來自美國的教宗，林瑞琪認為，今次教宗選舉有衝著美國總統特朗普而來的意味，希望選出一位新任教宗可以作出制衡。

title: 啟德體育園今晚舉行大型演唱會　港鐵將加強屯馬綫列車服務

港鐵表示，演唱會入場時間為黃昏下班時間，屯馬綫可能會比較繁忙，呼籲乘客為行程預留充裕時間。在觀衆離場時段，啟德站及宋皇臺站接近體育園的 D出入口，預計會十分繁忙，呼籲乘客保持耐心，遵照現場人員指示入站。港鐵會配合當局的人群管理措施，加派職員及加強廣播和標示等。屯馬綫列車班次會加密到2至3分鐘一班車，疏導乘客。除了八達通和單程票外，啟德及宋皇臺站所有閘機均接受二維碼及感應式信用卡/扣賬卡付費乘車。

title: HK stocks inch up amid caution on Sino-US talks
news_content:
The Hang Seng Index gained 80.29 points, or 0.35 percent, to open at 22,856.21 points on Friday amid hopes for tariff negotiations after US President Donald Trump unveiled a trade deal with Britain.

After the turbulence sparked by Trump's "Liberation Day" tariffs on April 2, markets have strengthened in recent weeks on optimism that countries will reach agreements with Washington to avoid his potentially damaging levies.

"The trade deal news... sets the table for the market that it should expect more deals in coming weeks and months," said Briefing.com analyst Patrick O'Hare.

"From that vantage point, it is providing a sentiment boost."

The deal reduces tariffs on British cars and lifts them on steel and aluminum, while in return Britain will open up markets to US beef and other farm products.

British Prime Minister Keir Starmer also hailed it as a "historic day", although the agreement is thin on details and both sides said there would be more negotiations.

A 10 percent baseline tariff on Britain imposed by Trump on April 2 also remains in place.

Top Chinese and US negotiators are set to meet on Saturday and Sunday in Switzerland for their first talks since Trump unveiled his tariffs assault.

The gathering has fueled hopes for a dialing down of tensions between the world's economic superpowers, which have seen Washington impose levies of 145 percent on China and Beijing retaliate with 125 percent tariffs of its own.

But there are concerns that little substantial progress will be made.

"It is clear the market is already pricing in some level of trade optimism... but without actual deals [outside of the US-UK] inked, it's hard to justify further upside," Razaqzada said.

While London and Washington closed in on a deal, the EU warned it would target US products, including planes and cars, worth 95 billion euros in retaliation for Trump's tariffs if their own negotiations fall flat. (AFP/Xinhua)

title: 特首中東行｜律師會稱本港擁具國際視野法律人才可助企業走出去
news_content:
行政長官李家超將會率團訪問卡塔爾和科威特，將隨團的律師會會長湯文龍表示，所有商貿活動都離不開法律，要有專業法律服務支持，企業在海外投資涉及不同法制，香港擁有具備國際視野的法律人才，可以協助企業「走出去」。

湯文龍在本台節目《千禧年代》說， 除了有很多國際律師事務所在香港設立辦事處，香港同時亦有超過1600名註冊海外律師，以及超過80家註冊的外地律師事務所，讓香港可以在海外併購、融資、知識產權及保險等方面提供法律服務。

湯文龍說，在CEPA新修訂下，增加「港資港法」和「港資港仲裁」措施，如果一些公司與香港有聯繫而在大灣區做生意，可以選用普通法作為制度，假如日後出現爭議，亦可選擇香港作為仲裁地。他表示，如果有內地企業到中東做生意或中東企業到內地做生意，就很大機會選擇香港作為跳板。

他又說，中東很多地方都用普通法，而香港是國家唯一一個用普通法的司法管轄區，亦是全球唯一一個以中英雙語的普通法司法管轄區。香港可以作為橋樑，協助中東企業，當他們不明白如何在內地做生意，可以找香港協助。

title: 特首中東行｜盧金榮稱商界重視中東市場　莊子雄冀新興產業多合作
news_content:
行政長官李家超將會率團訪問中東兩個國家，包括卡塔爾和科威特。將會隨團的工業總會主席莊子雄表示，業界對今次訪問很有期望，因為這兩個國家都希望打造經濟多元化，相信香港可以與它們在新興產業方面有更多合作機會。

莊子雄在本台節目《千禧年代》表示，中東國家與香港在文化等方面有很大不同，例如穆斯林文化，在特定時間需要祈禱，港商要在當地發展可能不太習慣。他期望今次行程可以與當地政府及商會代表聯繫，如果港商要到當地發展有甚麼要注意，如何可更快融入這兩個國家的市場。

同樣會隨團的廠商會會長盧金榮在同一節目表示，今次出訪中東是合適時機，因為國際環境局勢較緊張，發展多元化市場，可以減低貿易戰對香港的影響。他認為由特首親自帶團更有意義，反映特區政府與工商界都重視中東市場。

盧金榮期望與中東政府官員及政商界見面，多些交流，亦希望特區政府爭取更多投資有利政策。代表團亦包括內地企業代表，盧金榮認為突顯了香港內聯外通角色，彼此可以互補優勢，內地企業在基建項目做得較好，香港企業則在專業服務做得較好，可以有很多合作空間。

title: 蓋茨擬於20年內捐出2000億美元　助消除疾病及減少貧困
news_content:
微軟創始人蓋茨計劃在20年內，透過名下慈善基金會捐出2000億美元。

現年69歲的蓋茨表示，將提前在2045年年底關閉基金會，在基金會關閉前，將捐出九成九的個人財富，相信這筆錢將有助於實現他的幾個目標，包括消除小兒麻痺和瘧疾等，防止婦女和兒童死於可預防的疾病以及減少全球貧困。

蓋茨在接受路透社訪問時警告，由於世界各國政府削減資金，未來4到6年內，會令過去數十年來在降低死亡率方面取得的進展出現明顯倒退。

title: 日本3月實質薪酬連跌3個月　加班費創近1年來最大跌幅
news_content:
日本3月經通脹調整的實質薪酬連續3個月下跌，按年跌2.1%，跌幅大過2月經修訂後的1.5%。

3月基本薪酬升1.3%，與2月相同。但加班費轉跌1.1%，是去年9月以來首次下跌，並創近1年來最大跌幅，顯示企業活動可能偏軟。

3月家庭開支按年升2.1%，升幅遠高於市場估計的0.2%；按月升0.4%，亦好過預期的跌0.5%。

另外，至4月底，外匯儲備增至12982億美元，按月增加257億美元。

title: 'HK, MidEast are mutually beneficial trading partners'
news_content:
The Middle East is ideal for Hong Kong enterprises seeking to diversify their investment portfolios amid global trade uncertainties, according to the city’s largest business chamber.

The Hong Kong General Chamber of Commerce said there is growing interest from Middle Eastern firms and wealth funds to invest in this part of the world.

The group believes the SAR can provide solutions in sectors such as innovation, construction and education.

Its chairwoman Agnes Chan will be among dozens of business leaders joining Chief Executive John Lee on a visit to Qatar and Kuwait on Saturday.

She said her group regularly hosts officials and business executives from the Middle East. 

That included a meeting in April with Abdul Aziz Abdulla Al Ghurair, the chairman of Mashreq, a leading bank in the United Arab Emirates.

"He's particularly interested in the entrepreneurial ecosystem in the innovation and technology sector," Chan said.

"They've heard a lot about the high-quality productive forces in China and how we are focusing in terms of China's targeted 5 percent GDP growth."

While Gulf nations traditionally rely on oil export revenues, Chan said they've realised that oil prices could be under pressure in the event of a global economic slowdown.

"They realise relying on the traditional oil and gas is not the best way to go in terms of all the transformation that's going on.

"They have capital, so they are looking to invest in growing sectors.

"Life science is also an area they are interested in, and technology certainly, and then education exchange. So they're looking for more knowledge sharing between universities."

Hong Kong and Middle East countries have already been fostering closer ties. Chan noted that merchandise trade between the SAR and the six member states of the Gulf Cooperation Council – Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and the UAE – reached HK$154 billion in 2024, a 50 percent jump from 2020.

Commercial sector lawmaker Jeffrey Lam said growth in these markets does not mean Hong Kong can ditch its long-established trading partners like Europe and the United States.

Lam, who's also an executive councillor and a toy manufacturer, foresaw a tough few months ahead for SAR exporters as they lose orders or have to suspend shipments because of the tariffs imposed by the Trump administration.

"If you don't ship, you don't receive money and that creates cash-flow problems (for manufacturers)," he explained.

"We need the government's support on this matter, as well as from the Monetary Authority and the banks. There are also logistical issues because you have to find warehouses to store the goods."

Lam called on Hong Kong companies to think ahead and see how they can grasp the vast opportunities from the Gulf nations, especially in infrastructure construction.

"And after buildings are built, infrastructures are completed. There are so many, many opportunities. You know, how many lifts will be needed? How [much] office equipment? How many household items would be needed? You know, all those are opportunities for us," he said.

Lam, who is also part of the SAR delegation, said he's looking forward to the trip because there are "always good opportunities" whenever he travelled to the Middle East.

title: 特首中東行｜總商會：中東、香港與大灣區可做到三方合作
news_content:
行政長官李家超星期六將率領代表團訪問卡塔爾和科威特，隨團的香港總商會主席陳瑞娟期望，此行加強溝通合作，招商引資，亦期望與當地商會簽署合作備忘錄。

陳瑞娟表示，近年香港與海灣阿拉伯國家合作委員會六國的貿易額有所增長，去年中東投資在內地及香港市場有90億美元，包括來自沙特公共投資基金、卡塔爾投資局的主權財富基金，反映過往雙方交流及訪問取得成果。

陳瑞娟不認同香港只是作為中東企業進入內地市場的跳板、不能留住這些企業，反而認為引入大灣區城市可以做到三方合作，發揮香港超級聯繫人及超級增值人角色。中東亦有不少家族生意，本港作為資產管理中心，有能力留住超高資產淨值客戶。

總商會理事、立法會議員林健鋒，亦是代表團成員之一，他認為中東有很大商機，例如科威特，在新能源、基建等都有很大發展空間。他又說，商界要認真了解當地情況，因應情況做新建議或新產品。

總商會早前因應關稅戰導致中美經貿環境波動、政策不確定性高，決定延後訪美。林健鋒表示，過往港商較依賴美國市場，過去兩年對中東或東盟貿易有增長，但數量始終未及美國。他承認，要彌補美國市場，不是一時三刻可以做得到。

title: 美元指數重上100以上　美元兌日圓曾升穿146
news_content:

美國與英國達成貿易協議，提振風險胃納，美元兌避險貨幣日圓及瑞士法郎都升，市場關注中美貿易談判進展。

news_content:

title: 北韓證實昨日發射「火星炮-11甲」型戰術彈道導彈
news_content:
北韓證實昨日發射「火星炮-11甲」型戰術彈道導彈。

朝中社報道，東部遠程炮兵及導彈兵部隊昨日進行聯合打擊訓練，最高領導人金正恩指導訓練。訓練動用600毫米多管火箭炮和「火星炮-11甲」型戰術彈道導彈，旨在讓相關部隊熟悉按照國家核武器綜合管理體系，運用上述武器系統的程序。

報道說，金正恩要求在戰爭遏制戰略和執行戰略的各方面，不斷提高核武力的中樞作用，並強調不斷完善核武力經常性戰鬥準備態勢的重要性。金正恩還強調，要繼續提高武器系統的遠程精確打擊能力和效率。

title: 曼聯與熱刺將上演歐霸決賽全英對決　爭奪來季歐聯資格
news_content:
曼聯與熱刺分別擊敗對手，晉級歐霸盃決賽，將會上演全英對決。

曼聯在四強次回合主場迎戰畢爾包，半場落後一球情況下，下半場連入四球反勝，連同首回合作客淨勝三球，總比數以7:1淘汰對手。

首回合領先波杜基林特3:1的熱刺，次回合作客以兩球勝出，總比數以5:1晉級。

兩支目前分別排在聯賽榜第15和16位的英超球隊，將於5月21日在畢爾包主場上演的決賽中，爭奪下季歐聯席位。

紅魔領隊阿摩廉說，除非贏得決賽，否則不會慶祝。

另一支英超球隊車路士亦鎖定歐協聯決賽資格，他們在四強次回合主場一球小勝佐加頓斯，兩回合計贏5:1，決賽將會與貝迪斯爭奪冠軍。

貝迪斯經過兩回合賽事，法定時間與費倫天拿3:3賽和，貝迪斯在加時取得奠定勝的一球，總比數贏4:3躋身決賽。

title: 美烏領導人通話　特朗普稱冀雙方遵守停火協議
news_content:
美國總統特朗普與烏克蘭總統澤連斯基通電話，討論俄烏停火事宜。

澤連斯基表示，他向特朗普表明烏方準備好即日起實現為期30日的停火，願意展開任何形式的談判，但前提是俄方必須展現結束戰爭的誠意，首要舉措就是實現全面無條件停火。

特朗普在社交平台說，與俄烏的談判仍然繼續，呼籲雙方達成30日的無條件停火協議。他又說，希望雙方能夠遵守可接受的停火協議，如果停火協議未能遵守，美國及夥伴將會採取進一步的制裁。

title: US stocks rise after Trump announces UK trade deal
news_content:
US stocks finished firmly in the green on Thursday after President Donald Trump unveiled a "breakthrough" trade agreement with the United Kingdom.

The deal reduces tariffs on British cars, steel and aluminum, while in return Britain will open up its markets to US beef and other agricultural products.

The Dow Jones finished up 0.6 percent at 41,368, as did the S&P 500, which closed at 5,663.

The Nasdaq climbed 1.1 percent to 17,928.

"It's a combination of the Fed not saying anything negative combined with the potential agreement between the US and the UK," said CFRA's Sam Stovall, referring to the Federal Reserve's relatively buoyant view of the US economy.

"And the implication that there could be additional agreements with other countries down the road," he said.

Among individual firms, shares in US aviation giant Boeing closed up 3.3 percent after US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick indicated the UK planned to announce a new order of jets worth some US$10 billion.

The enthusiasm in financial markets spread to cryptocurrencies, with bitcoin rallying on the news to trade above US$101,500 for the first time since early February. (AFP)

title: 美交通部長宣布耗資數百億美元升級改造老化空管系統
news_content:
美國聯邦航空管理局連續第十一日，發布針對紐瓦克國際機場的地面延誤通知。

交通部長達菲宣布，政府將耗資數百億美元，對老化的空中交通管制系統進行現代化改造，以解決機場擠塞、航班延誤和安全問題，有關計劃涉及升級過時的雷達和電信系統、管制塔和其他設施，並增加空管人員數量。

自上月28日以來，由於設備和人員都出現問題，美國最繁忙機場之一的紐瓦克國際機場，持續錄得大量航班延誤或取消等混亂情況。聯邦航空管理局日前宣布，將增加機場空管人員數量，並更換故障的設備。

title: 印巴衝突持續　路透社：巴方以殲-10戰機擊落至少兩架印方戰機
news_content:
印度與巴基斯坦的軍事衝突持續。

印控克什米爾地區查謨市星期四晚傳出爆炸和警報聲，印度軍方指責巴基斯坦向印控克什米爾地區兩個軍事基地，以及旁遮普邦另一個軍事基地，發射導彈和無人機。

巴基斯坦國防部長否認攻擊印控克什米爾地區，又說一旦巴方發動攻擊，全世界都會知道。

印度星期二晚對巴基斯坦和巴控克什米爾地區的9個地點發動空襲，巴基斯坦指擊落五架印度戰機和一架無人機。

路透社引述美國官員表示，巴方以中國製的殲-10戰機發射空對空導彈，擊落至少兩架印度戰機。另一名官員說，至少一架被擊落戰機是法國製的陣風戰機。印度空軍發言人不予置評。

title: 特朗普料美中就貿易問題實質談判　對華關稅不可能再提高並會下降
news_content:
美國總統特朗普預計，美中兩國周末將會就貿易問題進行實質談判，認為會是一次非常友好的會晤，對華關稅亦不可能再提高至超過目前的145%水平，而且將會下降。

國務院副總理何立峰與美國財長貝森特，將會在瑞士會談，外界視為是解決中美貿易戰的第一步。特朗普說，相信中國非常希望達成協議，又說中國對美國有龐大的貿易順差，這是不可接受，他希望見到中國開放經濟。被問及會談後是否會與國家主席習近平對話，特朗普表示可能會。

在北京，商務部昨日重申，美方想透過談判解決問題，就要拿出談的誠意，在糾正錯誤做法、取消單邊加徵關稅等問題上做好準備，如果美方說一套做一套，甚至企圖以談為幌子，繼續搞脅迫訛詐，中方絕不會答應，更不會犧牲原則立場，犧牲國際公平正義去尋求達成任何協議。

title: 特朗普祝賀普雷沃斯特當選首位來自美國的教宗
news_content:
美國總統特朗普祝賀出生於芝加哥的普雷沃斯特，當選新任教宗，指知悉對方是首位來自美國的教宗，是一種榮幸。

特朗普說，期待與普雷沃斯特會面，認為將會是非常有意義的時刻。

title: 中俄元首談烏克蘭問題　習近平期待達成公平持久有約束力和平協議
news_content:
俄羅斯總統普京與國事訪俄的國家主席習近平會談後，兩人當地星期四下午在克里姆林宮總統辦公室茶敘，就烏克蘭危機等問題交換意見。

習近平指出，對烏克蘭危機，中方倡導並堅持共同、綜合、合作、可持續的全球安全觀，認為應重視各國合理安全關切，消除產生危機的根源。中方歡迎一切有利於和平的努力，期待透過對話達成一個公平、持久、有約束力，並被各當事方所接受的和平協議。

新華社報道，普京高度讚賞中方在政治解決烏克蘭危機問題上的客觀公正立場，俄方願意不設前提條件開啟和談，希望達成公正持久的和平協議。

另外，習近平指出，世界進入新的動蕩變革期，只要中俄保持戰略定力，堅持戰略協作，任何力量都阻擋不到兩國實現各自發展振興，阻擋不到中俄世代友好的民心所向，阻擋不到世界多極化和經濟全球化的時代潮流。

普京表示，俄中始終同舟共濟、相互支持，兩國友誼牢不可破。

title: 美英達成貿易協議　美國取消英國鋼鋁關稅　汽車關稅降至一成
news_content:
美國與英國宣布達成貿易協議，是美國總統特朗普向全球徵收對等關稅以來，首份達成的貿易協定。

根據協議，美國將會取消對英國鋼鋁徵收的25%關稅，對英國汽車的關稅亦會由27.5%下調至10%，每年限額10萬輛，但對英國其他商品仍會維持10%的基準關稅。英國就會向美國牛肉、乙醇及農產品大幅開放市場，並加快美國商品在英國的通關速度，最終細節將於未來幾星期公布。

特朗普當地星期四早上在白宮橢圓形辦公室，即場與身處捷豹路虎汽車工廠的英國首相施紀賢通電話，宣布兩國達成貿易協議。特朗普形容，英國是美國最珍視的盟友之一，協議將會為美國的出口產品提供數十億美元的額外市場准入，尤其是農業領域，並減少或取消很多歧視美國產品的非關稅壁壘。

商務部長盧特尼克表示，英國將會購買價值100億美元的波音飛機，美國亦會容許勞斯萊斯引擎免關稅進口。他說，協議將為美國生產商創造每年50億美元的新出口機會，關稅亦會為美國每年帶來60億美元的新收入。

施紀賢形容是歷史性一日，認為協議將會促進兩國之間的貿易、創造就業，英國亦向世界發出對商業持開放態度的信息。

title: 梵蒂岡樞機秘密會議選出新任教宗　料新教宗稍後與信眾見面

title: 夏寶龍抵澳門考察　轉達中央對新一屆政府開局良好的肯定
news_content:
中央港澳工作辦主任、國務院港澳辦主任夏寶龍昨日抵達澳門，展開六日考察行程。

夏寶龍昨日傍晚由行政長官岑浩輝和澳門中聯辦主任鄭新聰陪同到禮賓府，與行政、立法和司法機構主要負責人進行交流晚宴，轉達國家主席習近平對澳門的問候和關懷，以及中央對澳門新一屆政府開局良好的肯定。夏寶龍亦深入了解澳門各方面的發展現況和未來規劃，以及政府的各項施政。

岑浩輝歡迎夏寶龍到澳門考察，指夏寶龍此行再次充分體現習近平和中央高度關切澳門發展，新一屆政府會認真貫徹落實習近平重要講話精神，並在中央港澳辦、澳門中聯辦等部委大力支持配合下，有序推進落實各項施政部署。

title: Cross-border digital currency platform may debut soon
news_content:
The head of the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA), Eddie Yue, said a new digital currency platform could soon be put in place if a trial run proves successful.

The platform, called mBridge, aims to facilitate cross-border payments.

It's jointly developed by the People's Bank of China and the central banks in Thailand, the United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia, along with the HKMA.

"The trial run this year is using real-life transactions for cross-border settlement. If it goes on smoothly, the platform will actually be ready for launch," Yue told RTHK's "Government and You" programme.

He added that local officials have been working with their Middle Eastern counterparts in promoting linkages in equity and bond transactions.

title: 甯漢豪稱開發土地嘗試多元發展模式包括片區開發及優化原址換地
news_content:
發展局局長甯漢豪出席香港規劃師學會國際規劃論壇，向來自10個國家和地區的線上線下約500名與會者作主旨演講。

甯漢豪以北部都會區發展進程所遇到的各種挑戰，分享發展局近年就開發土地模式所作出的變革，包括嘗試多元發展模式，如片區開發、優化原址換地安排、採用更多公私營合作等，她強調「以人為本」的安置安排、城鄉共融的發展策略，以及講求彈性和戰略留白的新規劃路向。

在吸引企業落戶北都方面，甯漢豪認為，政府須確保公共財政穩健並可持續，向企業提供補貼並非輕易可為，強調香港吸引企業之處在於其自身優勢，包括實行簡單低稅制、普通法制度、完善法治、多元化人才庫，以及擁有「背靠祖國、聯通世界」的優勢，均是香港的獨特競爭優勢，應當持續強化。

title: 洪水橋/厦村新第二期第三批收回18幅土地約19200平方米
news_content:
地政總署今日根據《收回土地條例》，為洪水橋/厦村新發展區第二期發展張貼第三批收回土地公告，收回18幅私人土地，總面積約19200平方米。

這次收回的18幅私人土地，包括早前公開接受原址換地申請，但最終未有接獲申請的部分用地，以及1宗因申請被視為撤回，而未能完成原址換地所涉及的用地。有關土地需收回以讓政府進行工程。

18幅私人土地將於公告張貼後三個月，即今年8月9日復歸政府所有。政府會在土地復歸政府後，向相關土地業權人發放特惠土地補償。

土地復歸日期是指土地業權轉歸政府的日期，並非受影響住戶及業務經營者須遷出的限期。在受影響住戶和業務經營者遷出限期前3個月，地政總署會另行按照適用程序在相關範圍張貼公告，現時預計受影響的住戶和業務經營者最早須在今年12月遷出。地政總署正處理受影響人士的補償和安置事宜，盡量在遷出限期前為合資格人士安排上樓或發放補償。

全面發展後，洪水橋/厦村新發展區將提供約66700個新住宅單位，容納約18萬4千新增人口，並創造約15萬個就業機會。

title: New medical institute to enhance standards
news_content:
Health minister Lo Chung-mau said on Thursday the establishment of a new institute boosting clinical practices will allow patients to receive medical care of higher quality. 

The setting up of the Institute for Medical Advancement and Clinical Excellence (Imace) came after Chief Executive John Lee said in his policy address last year that the government would launch a platform for developing evidence-based clinical protocols and exploring the feasibility of devising service quality and efficiency standards for the public and private healthcare sectors.

The institute will help people understand which healthcare services to get for different illnesses. 

In a statement, Lo said Imace will allow for the exploration of more effective treatment options for patients thanks to expertise of both public and private healthcare professionals.

"I hope that the Imace can promote exchanges among healthcare professionals and maintain connections with institutions responsible for developing evidence-based medicine and clinical guidelines worldwide (including the mainland and overseas regions)," he said.

"This will enable our healthcare professionals to learn about and apply the latest technologies, further promoting Hong Kong's development into an international health and medical innovation hub."

The institute's founding members include medical practitioners from both the public and private medical sectors, including the Department of Health, the Hospital Authority and the Private Hospitals Association.

The Health Bureau said it only offers funding but will not be involved with the work of the institute to ensure its professional autonomy.

title: 余偉文稱促進內地、香港及中東三地投資渠道發展是未來重要課題
news_content:
金管局總裁余偉文表示，促進內地、香港及中東三地投資渠道發展是未來重要課題之一。去年底兩隻追蹤香港股票的交易所買賣基金（ETF）在沙特阿拉伯交易所上市，香港亦正協助阿聯酋建立債券結算及託管機構，期望為中東投資者提供投資香港與內地債券市場的渠道。

余偉文在本台電視節目《政正關你事》提到，2023年2月行政長官李家超率團訪問沙特和阿聯酋，推廣本港優勢，深化貿易、投資及文化等領域的聯繫。他指出，去年10月金管局出席沙特「未來投資倡議大會」期間，與沙特公共投資基金簽署合作備忘錄，設立10億美元聯合基金，鞏固香港作為中東及亞洲金融門戶的角色，並且在先進製造業、金融科技、生物科技及再生能源等範疇，引領香港及大灣區企業到當地發展，一方面能促進沙特經濟多元發展，同時突顯本港國際金融中心地位，助力內地企業拓展中東市場，形容是雙贏甚至三贏局面。

余偉文又提到，與阿聯酋等央行合作的貨幣橋（mBridge）已進入「最簡可行產品階段」，試行對一些真實貿易進行結算，若運作暢順將可正式推出。至於批發層面央行數碼貨幣項目Ensemble，以沙盒方式進一步研究及測試代幣化用例，金管局亦正與其他央行商討共同參與。

他提到，金管局與中東地區央行開展不少較實驗性，但潛力很好的科技項目。

title: 醫學實證與臨床卓越研究所成立　盧寵茂稱有助提升醫療水平
news_content:
醫務衞生局歡迎醫學實證與臨床卓越研究所今日正式成立。

醫卓所是匯聚香港醫療衞生界多方面力量的專業平台，以實證為本制訂臨床指引，並研究建立公私營醫療服務質素及效益基準，進一步提升香港享譽國際的醫療水平。

醫卓所今日舉行首次會議，7間創始成員機構，即香港醫學專科學院、衞生署、醫院管理局、基層醫療署、香港中文大學醫學院、香港大學李嘉誠醫學院，以及香港私家醫院聯會均有出席。經醫衞局邀請，醫專已提名其前主席梁嘉傑出任醫卓所首任召集人，醫專亦會提供秘書處支援，以助醫卓所開展工作。

醫衞局局長盧寵茂衷心感謝醫療衞生界同仁應邀成立醫卓所，標誌着香港醫療體系發展的新里程，醫卓所作為香港的專業平台，以循證醫學為基礎，結合公私營醫護人員的豐富經驗和臨床數據，將可開拓更具效益的醫療方案，讓在本港接受治療的廣大病人受惠。

盧寵茂又說，因應醫療科技日新月異，期望醫卓所能促進醫療專業交流，並與世界各地負責醫療專業實證及臨床指引的機構保持聯繫，讓醫護人員了解並應用最新技術，進一步推動香港發展成為國際醫療創新樞紐。

title: 涉製造及販運太空油毒品約值200萬元　36歲女子被捕
news_content:
警方搗破旺角白布街一個太空油毒品製毒及儲存倉庫，拘捕一名36歲女子，涉嫌「製造危險藥物」及「販運危險藥物」等。

警方九龍城警區特別職務隊第一隊督察張智謙說，警方檢獲2432粒太空油毒品煙彈、17公升懷疑製成依托咪酯的果味煙油、1.5公斤懷疑依托咪酯原材料、114支電子煙及36克懷疑霹靂可卡因等，巿值約200萬元。

警方提醒市民，任何將依托咪酯固體轉換成液體的行為均屬違法，呼籲年青人不要相信攜帶一兩支電子煙可免罪的說法，強調製毒及販毒均是非常嚴重的罪行。

title: 處理空運艙位訂單隱瞞利益衝突　物流公司前經理認罪還押候判
news_content:
一名42歲物流公司前經理，早前被廉政公署落案起訴兩項欺詐罪名，今日在區域法院承認控罪，暫委法官徐綺薇將案件押後至本月22日判刑，被告還押懲教署看管。

被告黃永浩是慕佰仕物流有限公司前空運及業務發展經理，他涉嫌處理客戶空運艙位訂單時隱瞞利益衝突，經兩間與他有關係的中介公司，向承運代理商發出總值逾910萬元的訂單，從中謀取私利共逾120萬元。

廉署早前接獲貪污投訴後展開調查，發現被告於2016年至2019年期間，先後建議慕佰仕經兩間公司向一間承運代理商發出逾430張空運艙位訂單，並向該兩間中介公司JTC及飛華，支付總值逾910萬元的訂單款項。

廉署調查顯示，JTC由與被告有關連的人士成立，被告及其家人在該公司均有財務權益，廉署人員亦在被告住所搜獲JTC的公司印鑑及支票簿等公司文件。調查又發現被告與飛華達成協議，安排慕佰仕透過飛華經JTC向承運代理商下訂單，被告會向飛華支付手續費，每張訂單涉款約50元至100元。被告透過有關安排，就涉案訂單獲取私利共逾120萬元。但他從來沒有向慕佰仕披露自己在JTC擁有權益，亦沒有披露他與飛華就訂單所作的協議。

title: 美國上周新申領失業援助人數減少1萬3千人

title: 曼谷抵港男女行李涉藏懷疑大麻花約值190萬元　明天提堂

title: 特區駐新加坡經貿辦到訪老撾　加強兩地貿易與投資及人文交流
news_content:
香港駐新加坡經貿辦人員到訪老撾首都萬象，深化與老撾政府及商界的了解與合作，並進一步加強雙方在貿易、投資及人文交流方面的關係。

駐新加坡經貿辦主任馮浩然星期二抵達後，隨即與老撾外交部亞太非司司長會面，介紹香港的最新發展。雙方亦就當前經濟與地緣政治形勢交換意見，並探討進一步加強合作、深化港老雙邊關係的機遇，駐新加坡經貿辦人員亦到訪萬象中學，了解該校與香港理工大學早前簽署的合作備忘錄的落實情況。

駐新加坡經貿辦聯昨日與投資推廣署和香港貿易發展局合辦「香港營商和投資機遇——通往大灣區的門戶」商務研討會及交流活動，吸引了約70名當地商界領袖及投資者參加，包括老撾國家工商會及老撾中華總商會的執委代表，粵港澳大灣區發展專員陳潔玲亦有參與。

訪問行程完結前，陳潔玲與馮浩然禮節拜會中國駐老撾特命全權大使方虹，分別向她介紹了粵港澳大灣區發展辦公室的最新工作情況，及駐新加坡經貿辦在老撾的政、商、民聯繫工作和成果。

title: 駐京辦與瀋陽及天津聯絡處鼓勵內地港人登記做選民
news_content:
立法會選舉將於12月7日舉行，特區政府於上月25日起展開選民登記運動。在北京，特區政府駐京辦事處主任鄭偉源說，過去兩星期駐京辦聯同瀋陽及天津聯絡處積極鼓勵內地港人登記，截至目前為止，已有至少40位內地港人登記成為選民。

鄭偉源說，大部分內地港人都已登記，但有部分年齡介乎18至20歲的年青人尚未完成相關手續，他形容參與選舉投票非常有意義，能鼓勵特區政府良政善治，呼籲內地的港人港企，盡快在6月2日截止前，利用智方便進行選民登記。

駐京辦晚上在中國香港地區商會的周年晚宴上，設置選民登記站，協助商會成員進行登記。商會會長楊莉珊表示，現時商會的大部分香港會員已是選民，但新成立的青年組，約有百多人剛來內地讀書，商會將響應政府的號召，鼓勵他們盡快登記。

title: 中俄元首同意堅定不移深化戰略協作　推動兩國關係高水平發展
news_content:
國事訪俄的國家主席習近平，在莫斯科克里姆林宮與俄羅斯總統普京舉行會談，兩國元首就中俄關係、重大國際與地區問題，深入交換意見，一致同意堅定不移深化戰略協作，推動中俄關係穩定、健康、高水平發展，並共同弘揚正確二戰史觀，維護聯合國權威和地位，維護國際公平正義。

習近平指出，中俄雙方要堅持合作大方向，排除外部干擾，讓合作「穩的基礎」更堅實、「進的動能」更充足，並密切在聯合國、上海合作組織、金磚國家等多邊平台協調和配合，團結全球南方，堅持真正的多邊主義，引領全球治理變革正確方向。他強調無論外部環境如何變化，中國都將堅定辦好自身的事，願與俄方共同承擔時代賦予的特殊責任，維護全球多邊貿易體制及產供鏈穩定暢通。

新華社報道，普京表示俄中關係建立在相互平等與尊重的基礎上，不針對第三方，不受一時一事影響，堅定不移推動俄中關係發展、擴大互利合作是俄方戰略選擇。他又說俄方堅定奉行一個中國原則，在台灣問題上始終支持中方立場。

會談後，兩國元首共同簽署聯合聲明，並見證雙方交換20多份雙邊合作文本，涵蓋全球戰略穩定、維護國際法權威、生物安全、投資保護、數碼經濟、檢疫、電影合作等領域，責成兩國相關部門按照雙方達成的共識，加強溝通對接，推進務實合作，取得更多實效。兩國元首又共同會見傳媒。

title: 積金局指海皇未為員工繳交多個月供款及附加費共約57萬元
news_content:
海皇粥店全線結業，積金局表示，海皇未為約130名員工繳交去年12月的附加費及今年1月至3月的強積金供款及附加費，涉及金額約57萬元，積金局已啟動程序入稟區域法院向海皇提出民事申索，為受影響員工追討有關欠款及附加費。

積金局回覆查詢時表示，早前在局方主動介入及調查下，自去年8月以來，已成功為約200名海皇員工追回約130萬元的強積金供款及附加費，有關欠款已經由受託人直接存入受影響員工的強積金帳戶。

至於今年4月份的強積金供款，有關供款日為今年5月12日，局方會繼續密切監察有關強積金供款情況及採取適當的行動。如海皇最終清盤，積金局會代表受影響員工向清盤人或破產管理主任提出價權證明。如其後收到清盤人分派的款項，積金局會把款項交予強積金受託人，並存入受影響員工的強積金帳戶。

title: 李家超稱政府會繼續鞏固行政立法關係　帶領香港共創繁榮昌盛
news_content:
行政長官李家超表示，政府會繼續鞏固行政立法關係，在行政主導和「愛國者治港」原則相適應下，與立法會議員團結一致，帶領香港共創繁榮昌盛 。

李家超在社交專頁表示，下午與一眾立法會議員出席立法會綜合大樓擴建主體工程竣工儀式，並與立法會主席梁君彥共同為大樓主入口外牆的「立」字徽號，主持亮燈儀式。

他又與梁君彥到大樓11樓空中花園主持羅漢松植樹儀式，李家超說，種植兩棵羅漢松寓意吉祥、安康、長青、聚財，象徵行政立法齊心共同建設美好香港，為香港經濟注入新動力。

李家超說，立法會秘書處委託一個本地藝術組織，製作了擴建後大樓新面貌的微模型，以1:100 比例展示大樓的結構及建築特式。模型由數十位藝術家和工程人員攜手制作，糅合了精巧工藝與創新科技，不僅呈現立法會的日常，亦將重要的歷史時刻紀錄下來。他說微模型之後會在立法會圖書館長期展出，歡迎大家前往參觀。
